content: मायूर {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (री|{%<ab>f.</ab>%}) [मयूर-अण्] {@--1@} Belonging to or arising from a peacock; मायूरी मदयति मार्जना मनांसि <ls>M. 1. 21.</ls> {@--2@} Made of the feathers of a peacock. {@--3@} Drawn by a peacock (as a car). {@--4@} Dear to a peacock. --रं A flock of peacocks. --री <ab>N.</ab> of a plant (अजमोदा).
